title: [MINDSET] 7: "How To Tap Into Your Zone Of Genius" w/ Vanessa Horn
description: On this week’s episode of the “You Turn” podcast, Vanessa Horn talks to Ashley about how to simultaneously make the most money and find the most fulfillment in life, which she coins the "zone of genius." Tune in to get advice on discovering your own path to purposeful living, and why it’s important to honor your heart along the way. What makes you come alive? What makes you feel good? What are your natural skillsets? Answering these questions will lead you to that zone of genius. And of course, stick around for some post-episode thoughts from Ashley!
